posts.post_content:
[Melira, Sylvok Outcast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Melira, Sylvok Outcast)  
[Kitchen Finks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kitchen Finks)  
[Seedborn Muse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Seedborn Muse)  
  
Sac the Finks for as much land as you have in play, gaining that much life and doubling your land base. End of your opponent's turn, do it again, and basically have every land you own in play.
